reauth_confirm.description: The authentication credentials for {host}:{port} need to be updated.

data_description.api_token: The API token generated from your account on your Traccar Server
data_description.host: The hostname or IP address of your Traccar Server

migrate_to_api_token.message: To continue using Traccar Server, you need to migrate to API token based authentication.

data_description.custom_attributes: Add any custom or calculated attributes here. These will be added to the device attributes
data_description.events: Selected events will be fired in Home Assistant
data_description.max_accuracy: Any position reports with accuracy higher than this value will be ignored
data_description.skip_accuracy_filter_for: Attributes defined here will bypass the accuracy filter if they are present in the update
